item.text: On that day after Jesus went out of the house, he sat by the lake.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> such a <st data-num="4183" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="4314">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5620">that</st> he <st data-num="1684" class="">got</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="4143">boat</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2521" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="2523">while</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="123" class="">shore</st>.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2980" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4183">many things</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3850" class="">parables</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying:</st> “<st data-num="3004">Listen</st>!<n id="3" /> A <st data-num="4687" class="">sower</st> <st data-num="1831">went out</st> to <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1722">as</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sowed</st>, <st data-num="3739">some</st> seeds<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4071" class="">birds</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="2719" class="">devoured</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="243">Other</st><n id="1" /> seeds <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4075">rocky ground</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> they did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">much</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">soil</st>. They <st data-num="1816">sprang up</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">quickly</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">soil</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="899" class="">deep</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="393">came up</st>, they were <st data-num="2739" class="">scorched</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> they did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> sufficient <st data-num="4491" class="">root</st>, they <st data-num="3583" class="">withered</st>.

<st data-num="243" class="">Other</st> seeds <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="173" class="">thorns</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="305">grew up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="638" class="">choked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> seeds <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">soil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">produced</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">grain</st>, <st data-num="3739">some</st> a <st data-num="1540" class="">hundred</st> times as much, <st data-num="3738">some</st> <st data-num="1835" class="">sixty</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739">some</st> <st data-num="5144" class="">thirty</st>.
The one who has ears had better listen!”
Then the disciples came to him and said, “Why do you speak to them in parables?”

He <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4771">You</st> have been <st data-num="1325">given</st><n id="2" /> the opportunity to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3466" class="">secrets</st><n id="4" /> of the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> they <st data-num="1325" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> will be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> more, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="4052">have an abundance</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">whoever</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> will be <st data-num="142" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> I <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3850" class="">parables:</st> Although they <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="991" class="">see</st>, and although they <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> do they <st data-num="4920" class="">understand</st>.

And concerning them the prophecy of Isaiah is fulfilled that says:

“‘You will listen carefully yet will never understand,

you will look closely yet will never comprehend.

For the heart of this people has become dull;

they are hard of hearing,

and they have shut their eyes,

so that they would not see with their eyes

and hear with their ears

and understand with their hearts

and turn, and I would heal them.’
“But your eyes are blessed because they see, and your ears because they hear.
For I tell you the truth, many prophets and righteous people longed to see what you see but did not see it, and to hear what you hear but did not hear it.
“So listen to the parable of the sower:

When <st data-num="3956" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> about the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4920" class="">understand</st> it, the <st data-num="4191">evil one</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="726" class="">snatches</st> what was <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart;</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the seed <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">path</st>.

The<n id="1" /> seed <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4075">rocky ground</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the person who <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">receives</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4491" class="">root</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="235" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">does</st> not <st data-num="4340" class="">endure;</st><n id="1" /> when<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2347" class="">trouble</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1375" class="">persecution</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> of the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>, <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> he <st data-num="4624">falls away</st>.

The<n id="1" /> seed <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">among</st> <st data-num="173" class="">thorns</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the person who <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="165" class="">worldly</st> <st data-num="3308" class="">cares</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="539" class="">seductiveness</st> of <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4846" class="">choke</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">so</st> it <st data-num="1096">produces</st> <st data-num="175" class="">nothing</st>.
But as for the seed sown on good soil, this is the person who hears the word and understands. He bears fruit, yielding a hundred, sixty, or thirty times what was sown.”
He presented them with another parable: “The kingdom of heaven is like a person who sowed good seed in his field.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1722">while</st> <st data-num="444" class="">everyone</st> was <st data-num="2518" class="">sleeping</st>, an <st data-num="2190" class="">enemy</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sowed</st> <st data-num="2215">darnel</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3319" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="4621" class="">wheat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="565">went away</st>.

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5528" class="">plants</st> <st data-num="985" class="">sprouted</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160">produced</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">grain</st>, <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="2215">darnel</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">appeared</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="3616">landowner</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4334" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, ‘<st data-num="2962" class="">Sir</st>, <st data-num="3780">didn’t</st> you <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">seed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="68" class="">field</st>? <st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> did the <st data-num="2215">darnel</st> <st data-num="2192">come</st> from?’

He <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, ‘An <st data-num="2190" class="">enemy</st> has <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this!’</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1401">slaves</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>, ‘Do you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> us to <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="4816" class="">gather</st> <st data-num="846">it</st>?’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3588">he</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="3756" class="">No</st>, <st data-num="3379" class="">since</st> in <st data-num="4816" class="">gathering</st> the <st data-num="2215" class="">darnel</st> you may <st data-num="1610" class="">uproot</st> the <st data-num="4621" class="">wheat</st> along <st data-num="260" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846">it</st>.
Let both grow together until the harvest. At harvest time I will tell the reapers, “First collect the darnel and tie it in bundles to be burned, but then gather the wheat into my barn.”’”
He gave them another parable: “The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed that a man took and sowed in his field.
It is the smallest of all the seeds, but when it has grown it is the greatest garden plant and becomes a tree, so that the wild birds come and nest in its branches.”
He told them another parable: “The kingdom of heaven is like yeast that a woman took and mixed with three measures of flour until all the dough had risen.”
Jesus spoke all these things in parables to the crowds; he did not speak to them without a parable.

This fulfilled what was spoken by the prophet:

“I will open my mouth in parables,

I will announce what has been hidden from the foundation of the world.”
Then he left the crowds and went into the house. And his disciples came to him saying, “Explain to us the parable of the darnel in the field.”

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “The one who <st data-num="4687" class="">sowed</st> the <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">seed</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st>.

The <st data-num="68" class="">field</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">seed</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>. The <st data-num="2215" class="">poisonous weeds</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil one</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2190" class="">enemy</st> who <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st>. The <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="4930" class="">end</st> of the <st data-num="165" class="">age</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2327" class="">reapers</st> are <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>.

<st data-num="5618" class="">As</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2215" class="">poisonous weeds</st><n id="2" /> are <st data-num="4816" class="">collected</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2618" class="">burned</st> with <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> it will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="4930" class="">end</st> of the <st data-num="165" class="">age</st>.

The <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> will <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="4816" class="">gather</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> that <st data-num="4625">causes sin</st> <st data-num="2532">as well as</st> all <st data-num="458" class="">lawbreakers</st>.<n id="1" />
They will throw them into the fiery furnace, where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
Then the righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father. The one who has ears had better listen!
“The kingdom of heaven is like a treasure, hidden in a field, that a person found and hid. Then because of joy he went and sold all that he had and bought that field.
“Again, the kingdom of heaven is like a merchant searching for fine pearls.
When he found a pearl of great value, he went out and sold everything he had and bought it.
“Again, the kingdom of heaven is like a net that was cast into the sea that caught all kinds of fish.

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> it <st data-num="3739" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">full</st>, they <st data-num="307" class="">pulled</st> it <st data-num="123" class="">ashore</st>, <st data-num="2523">sat down</st>, and <st data-num="4816" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> fish <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="30" class="">containers</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">threw</st> the <st data-num="4550" class="">bad</st> <st data-num="1854">away</st>.

It will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3779">this way</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="4930" class="">end</st> of the <st data-num="165" class="">age</st>. <st data-num="32" class="">Angels</st> will <st data-num="1831" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="873" class="">separate</st> the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st>
and throw them into the fiery furnace, where there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
“Have you understood all these things?” They replied, “Yes.”
Then he said to them, “Therefore every expert in the law who has been trained for the kingdom of heaven is like the owner of a house who brings out of his treasure what is new and old.”
Now when Jesus finished these parables, he moved on from there.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3968" class="">hometown</st><n id="2" /> and began to <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">They</st><n id="5" /> were <st data-num="1605" class="">astonished</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4159">Where</st> did <st data-num="3778" class="">this man</st> get <st data-num="3778">such</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1411">miraculous powers</st>?

<st data-num="3756 1510">Isn’t</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> the <st data-num="5045">carpenter’s</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>? <st data-num="3756">Isn’t</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">named</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> aren’t <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st>, <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st>?

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3780 1510">aren’t</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sisters</st> here <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>? <st data-num="3767">So</st> <st data-num="4159">where</st> did <st data-num="3778" class="">he</st> get <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>?”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> so they <st data-num="4624">took offense</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “A <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="820">without honor</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> his <st data-num="3968" class="">hometown</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> own <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.”
And he did not do many miracles there because of their unbelief.
